subject: Mounting holes in baseplate
description_text:
Hello, I would like to purchase your pedals. Could you please tell me the
dimensions of the mounting holes in your baseplate , so I can check it on
my cockpit?

conversations.body_text: Hello, thank you for your interest and support. Here are the dimensions for the pedal base plate. I hope this proves helpful.

That's great, thank you!

чт, 18 сент. 2025 г. в 10:04, support@simsonn.com
